sentences.sentence: To make a sapphire crystal, the basic material used is a salt cleansed from any foreign body (ammoniacal alum).
sentences.translation: 蓝宝石水晶玻璃的主要原料是一种经过洗涤后除去了所有异物的盐(氨明矾)。

sentences.sentence: A study for leaching of a low grade and difficult to separate copper ore was performed by using ammoniacal pressure leaching method.
sentences.translation: 用加压氨浸的方法，对某低品位难选离析铜矿进行了浸出研究。

sentences.sentence: Skim serum is an industrial effluent from rubber factories. It is of higher BOD and contains about 1% protein and 0.05-0.3% ammoniacal nitrogen, etc.
sentences.translation: 胶清废水系天然橡胶初加工时的一种工业废水，具有较高的生化需氧量(BOD)，其中约含有1%蛋白质，0.05 ~ 0.3%氨态氮等。
